What is (are) Diabetic Retinopathy ?,"In this test, a special dye is injected into your arm. Pictures are taken as the dye passes through the blood vessels in your retina. The test allows your eye care professional to identify any leaking blood vessels and recommend treatment.",NIHSeniorHealth,Diabetic Retinopathy
